text:
@realDonaldTrump You are the " King of fools"!

1.A pandemic is not a "pissing" contest
2. An empathic, mature & humane man would not brag about having the most ventilators 
3.Re-open the country pre- maturely w/out enough #COVID19 tests
4. USA still needs #PPEs, medical supplies & ventilators
